item.title: Wireless Interface TXPower Error
item.description: I turned-off my built-in wireless network interface using the command: 1iwconfig wlan0 txpower off Howerver, I can no longer turn-it back on. Logic says just change "off" to "on" but instead, I get this error. 1root@raspberrypi:/home/pi# iwconfig wlan0 txpower on 2Error for wireless request "Set Tx Power" (8B27) : 3GET failed on device wlan0 ; Input/output error. Current status of the wireless interface looks like: 1root@raspberrypi:/home/pi# iwconfig wlan0 2wlan0 IEEE 802.
